titleStmt.title: Be it knowne vnto all men, that I Nicholas Bowden chirurgion, cutter of the stone, and also occultest, curer of the ruptures without cutting, with the helpe of almightie God, can cure and helpe these sicknesses and infirmities following
titleStmt.author: Bowden, Nicholas, fl. 1605?

titleStmt.title: Be it knowne vnto all men, that I Nicholas Bowden chirurgion, cutter of the stone, and also occultest, curer of the ruptures without cutting, with the helpe of almightie God, can cure and helpe these sicknesses and infirmities following
titleStmt.author: Bowden, Nicholas, fl. 1605?

notesStmt.note: Claims cures for kidney stone, hare lip, etc.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
